summary: This modders resource has been replaced by Hoddminir Flowers and Hoddminir Plants and Trees (links in description).
descriptionHtml:
This resource pack has been replaced the [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/55158/?]Hoddminir Flowers pack[/url] (for the water plant grasses) and [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/38651/?]Hoddminir Plants and Trees pack [/url](for the water lilies). If you are interested in using any of these resources please follow the links above to find the files. 



History
=======

v1.0, 05/01/2013 - Initial release
        08/01/2013 - Added an optional esp file where all the plants are added
        22/06/2014 Mod merged with other Hoddminir resource packs

Contact
=======
If something is not working, please contact me.
You can find me on TESNexus and the official Elder Scrolls forums as 'Elinen'


Credits
=======
Ztree for the Water lily models.
SparrowPrince for permission to use the Lush Grass models.
SkitKnapp for help with cleaning up some of my photos for the textures.
Thanks to [url=http://www.darkcreations.org/]Dark Creations[/url] for hosting the Hoddminir project.
Geggakloss helped taking some of the photos used
Bethesda for an excellent game, and the original grass models.
author: Elinen and Ztree
